source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a static, high-angle scenery shot of a bustling city at night, likely Paris, with its characteristic architecture. The only movement is from the traffic on the streets, which appears as long, glowing light trails due to a time-lapse or long-exposure effect. The shot captures the vibrant energy of the city after dark.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

source_caption_data.final_feedback: The video is not a static shot as described; the camera is actually zooming out.
